q_en: What are the top three products made in all orders in total?
gt:
Hey there! üòÑ Let's dive into the top three products made in all orders. Here's a neat little table for you:

| Product ID | Total Made | Attributes     | Description |
|------------|------------|----------------|-------------|
| 7          | 540        | Purple, M size | Skirt       |
| 15         | 345        | Pink, M size   | Skirt       |
| 27         | 260        | Yellow, S size | T-shirt     |

These are the champions of production! üèÜ If you have any more questions, feel free to ask!

steps.sql: SELECT op.product_id, SUM(op.number) as total_quantity FROM order_product op GROUP BY op.product_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC LIMIT 3;
steps.description: Retrieve the total quantity of each product made in all orders

steps.sql: SELECT p.attributes, pt.description FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE p.id IN (7, 15, 27);
steps.description: Retrieve the product attributes and type description for the top three products

response:
Sure! Let's dive into the top three products made in all orders. Here's a breakdown of the products based on their total quantities:

| Product ID | Total Quantity | Attributes     | Description |
|------------|----------------|----------------|-------------|
| 7          | 540            | Purple, M size | Skirt       |
| 15         | 345            | Pink, M size   | Skirt       |
| 27         | 260            | Yellow, S size | T-shirt     |

It looks like skirts are quite popular! üòÑ If you have any more questions or need further details, feel free to ask!
